refnamediv.refpurpose: Command used by the libcapsule build system to generate proxy library source files.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: capsule-mkstublib generates the source code for a libcapsule proxy library from a standard set of inputs (described below).

listitem.para: The SONAME of the target, of the form libFOO.so.X (eg libz.so.1)

A file containing a list of SONAMEs (one on each line) not to include in the libcapsule proxy: DSOs listed here will not be loaded from the foreign tree and must come from the normal set searched by the linker.
For example if libz.so.1 is listed here, and TARGET depends on libz.so.1 then it will be run-time linked against the copy of libz from / - not any copies which are found under TREE
This file is empty by default in new prjects.
A file containing a list of SONAMEs (one on each line) whose symbols should be exported.
Symbols from TARGET are always exported.
Output filename
The version of the target library our proxy will pretend to be, in the format MAJOR:MINOR:SUB
The format is the same format as consumed by libtool. Only MAJOR must be present if this argument is supplied.
The default value is determined by parsing the soname of the library.
The mount point of the foreign filesystem tree from which TARGET and its dependencies will be acquired.
This value can be overridden by --runtime-tree and --search-tree.
The default is the soname-specific environment variable (eg CAPSULE_LIBGL_SO_1_PREFIX for libGL.so.1), or the CAPSULE_PREFIX environment variable, or /host.
Use replacement capsule-symbols(1)
Use this symbols file instead of the output of capsule-symbols(1)
Do or don't provide an explicit override for dlopen(3) calls made outside the capsule in the generated source.
[There is always an implicit override - this just exposes the implementation for easy modification]
Do or don't update the exported symbol list if EXPORTS is updated [default: do]
Find libraries to be proxied in this chroot, sysroot or container at compile-time.
default: TREE or / if unset
Find libraries to be proxied in this chroot, sysroot or container at runtime if CAPSULE_PREFIX or the library-specific env var (eg CAPSULE_LIBGL_SO_1_PREFIX for libGL.so.1) is unset.

refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: The order of arguments is a bit pathological: This is for historical reasons. Since the command is not expected to be invoked outside of libcapsule's build scripts this is not considered a major problem.
